mapper.insert: insert into ec_product (product_cd, product_nam, product_typ, product_ver, duty, premium, amount, sale_chnl, eff_date, exp_date, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat ) values (#{productCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{premium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleChnl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ec_product set product_nam = #{productNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_typ = #{productTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_ver = #{productVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, premium = #{premium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_chnl = #{saleChnl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eff_date = #{effDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exp_date = #{expDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where product_cd = #{productCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select product_cd, product_nam, product_typ, product_ver, duty, premium, amount, sale_chnl, eff_date, exp_date, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_product where product_cd = #{productCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select product_cd, product_nam, product_typ, product_ver, duty, premium, amount, sale_chnl, eff_date, exp_date, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_product
